title: $3400 / 3br, 1.5 Bath- 1242 sqft Pleasanton townhouse for rent
posting_body: ['$3400 / 3br, 1.5 Bath- 1242 sqft Wonderful Pleasanton townhouse with easy commute to renowned great schools in Pleasanton!!!', 'Available by 6 Sept 2022.', 'This two-story beautiful townhouse has it all!', 'Kitchen has all appliances, granite, separate dining area.', 'Rich laminate flooring throughout living room.', 'Carpet on bedrooms, stairs.', 'Easy commute to schools in Pleasanton / Dublin / Livermore!', 'Dublin/Pleasanton BART is on 5 mins drive!', 'Easy access to HWY 580 / 680!', 'Central location in East Bay with BART connection to SFO and OAK airports!!', 'Lots of storage space inside the home and a separate storage room in the back yard.', 'Washer Dryer laundry in the unit.', 'Walking distance from groceries, great restaurants, laundry, salon services', 'Lush Green community lawn areas, play structure for kids.', 'Gated Backyard has rose bushes, BBQ area, direct entry to parking.', 'Two car dedicated port parking and lots of guest parking.', "Pleasanton has been ranked as one of America's best cities in which to live, it has best public schools with top rankings, many corporate offices and a very peaceful prosperous community.", "This is a 'No smoking' property, No pets allowed."]
